channel.title: Where add this plz

item.title: Where add this plz
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

Add

public int specialDelay = 0;

Under

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

In client.java

Add

[code] /Special Weapons/
if (Skills.specials.specialAmount <= 99 && specialDelay <= 0) {
Skills.specials.specialAmount += 1;
specialDelay = 4;
Skills.specials.specialAttacks(playerId);
Skills.specials.specialAttacks2(playerId);
Skills.specials.specialAttacks3(playerId);
Skills.specials.specialAttacks4(playerId);
Skills.specials.specialAttacks5(playerId);
Skills.specials.specialAttacks6(playerId);
}

specialDelay -= 1;

l33thax(12323);
l33thax(7574);
l33thax(7599);
l33thax(7549);
l33thax(8493);
l33thax(7499);[/code]

Under ur current boolean process()

Tell me if you get any problems
